title: Bose has released API docs and opened the API for its EoL SoundTouch speakers
author: rayrey
aiHeadline: Bose gives a final hurrah to its SoundTouch speakers by releasing API docs just before they become obsolete, proving that even tech giants can't escape the inevitable.

title: Google AI Studio is now sponsoring Tailwind CSS
author: qwertyforce
aiHeadline: Google's AI division throws its weight behind Tailwind CSS, because even robots need a stylish interface to show off their smarts.

title: Open Infrastructure Map
author: efskap
aiHeadline: The Open Infrastructure Map lets you explore the world's underground networks, because who doesn't love a good digging project?

title: Project Patchouli: Open-source electromagnetic drawing tablet hardware
author: ffin
aiHeadline: Project Patchouli brings DIY creativity to the next level with an open-source electromagnetic drawing tablet, because why buy when you can build?

title: Iran Goes Into IPv6 Blackout
author: honeycrispy
aiHeadline: Iran takes a step back in internet connectivity as they face an IPv6 blackout, proving that sometimes, going back is the only way forward.
